update.sql: insert into LocalizedEntry select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedEntry;
insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select max(id) + 1, 'Lomake', 'fi', (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry) from LocalizedValue
insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select max(id) + 1, 'Form', 'en', (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry) from LocalizedValue

insert into QueryPageTemplate (id, name_id, iconName, archived, creator_id, lastModifier_id, created, lastModified, pageType) select max(id) + 1, (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry), 'form', 0, 1, 1, '2012-01-01 00:00:00', '2012-01-01 00:00:00', 'FORM' from QueryPageTemplate
insert into QueryPageSettingKey (id, name) select max(id) + 1, 'form.fields' from QueryPageSettingKey

insert into QueryPageTemplateSetting (id, key_id, queryPageTemplate_id) select max(id) + 1, (select id from QueryPageSettingKey where name = "visible"), (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplate) from QueryPageTemplateSetting
insert QueryPageTemplateSimpleSetting (id, value) select (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplateSetting), '1'
insert into LocalizedEntry select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedEntry;
insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select max(id) + 1, 'Taustatietolomake', 'fi', (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry) from LocalizedValue
insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select max(id) + 1, 'Background Information Form', 'en', (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry) from LocalizedValue

insert into QueryPageTemplate (id, name_id, iconName, archived, creator_id, lastModifier_id, created, lastModified, pageType) select max(id) + 1, (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry), 'backgroundinformationform', 0, 1, 1, '2012-01-01 00:00:00', '2012-01-01 00:00:00', 'FORM' from QueryPageTemplate

insert into QueryPageTemplateSetting (id, key_id, queryPageTemplate_id) select max(id) + 1, (select id from QueryPageSettingKey where name = "form.fields"), (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplate) from QueryPageTemplateSetting
insert into LocalizedEntry select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedEntry

insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select (select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedValue), '[{"type":"LIST","caption":"Sex","options":[{"label":"Male","value":"NEW-0"},{"label":"Female","value":"NEW-1"}],"listType":"RADIO","name":"1"},{"type":"LIST","caption":"Age","options":[{"label":"10-14","value":"NEW-0"},{"label":"15-24","value":"NEW-1"},{"label":"25-44","value":"NEW-2"},{"label":"45-64","value":"NEW-3"},{"label":"65-","value":"NEW-4"}],"listType":"RADIO","name":"2"},{"type":"LIST","caption":"Status","options":[{"label":"Employed","value":"NEW-0"},{"label":"Unemployed","value":"NEW-1"},{"label":"Student","value":"NEW-2"},{"label":"Retired","value":"NEW-3"}],"listType":"RADIO","name":"3"},{"type":"LIST","caption":"Level of education","options":[{"label":"Pre-primary education","value":"NEW-0"},{"label":"Primary education","value":"NEW-1"},{"label":"Lower secondary education","value":"NEW-2"},{"label":"Upper secondary level education","value":"NEW-3"},{"label":"Lowest level tertiary education","value":"NEW-4"},{"label":"Lower-degree level tertiary education","value":"NEW-5"},{"label":"Higher-degree level tertiary education","value":"NEW-6"},{"label":"Doctorate or equivalent level tertiary education","value":"NEW-7"},{"label":"Level of education unknown","value":"NEW-8"}],"listType":"RADIO","name":"4"},{"type":"LIST","caption":"Region","options":[{"label":"Uusimaa","value":"NEW-0"},{"label":"Varsinais-Suomi","value":"NEW-1"},{"label":"Satakunta","value":"NEW-2"},{"label":"Kanta-Häme","value":"NEW-3"},{"label":"Pirkanmaa","value":"NEW-4"},{"label":"Päijät-Häme","value":"NEW-5"},{"label":"Kymenlaakso","value":"NEW-6"},{"label":"South Karelia","value":"NEW-7"},{"label":"Etelä-Savo","value":"NEW-8"},{"label":"Pohjois-Savo","value":"NEW-9"},{"label":"North Karelia","value":"NEW-10"},{"label":"Central Finland","value":"NEW-11"},{"label":"South Ostrobothnia","value":"NEW-12"},{"label":"Ostrobothnia","value":"NEW-13"},{"label":"Central Ostrobothnia","value":"NEW-14"},{"label":"North Ostrobothnia","value":"NEW-15"},{"label":"Kainuu","value":"NEW-16"},{"label":"Lapland","value":"NEW-17"},{"label":"Åland","value":"NEW-18"}],"listType":"RADIO","name":"5"}]', 'en', max(id) from LocalizedEntry

insert into LocalizedValue (id, text, locale, entry_id) select (select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedValue), '[{"type":"LIST","listType":"RADIO","name":"0","caption":"Sukupuoli","options":[{"label":"Mies","value":"0"},{"label":"Nainen","value":"1"}]},{"type":"LIST","listType":"RADIO","name":"1","caption":"Ikäkausi","options":[{"label":"10-14 vuotta","value":"0"},{"label":"15-24 vuotta","value":"1"},{"label":"25-44 vuotta","value":"2"},{"label":"45-64 vuotta","value":"3"},{"label":"65-","value":"4"}]},{"type":"LIST","listType":"RADIO","name":"2","caption":"Asema","options":[{"label":"Työllinen","value":"0"},{"label":"Työtön","value":"1"},{"label":"Opiskelija","value":"2"},{"label":"Eläkeläinen","value":"3"}]},{"type":"LIST","listType":"RADIO","name":"3","caption":"Koulutusaste","options":[{"label":"Esiaste","value":"0"},{"label":"Alempi perusaste","value":"1"},{"label":"Ylempi perusaste","value":"2"},{"label":"Keskiaste","value":"3"},{"label":"Alin korkea-aste","value":"4"},{"label":"Alempi korkeakouluaste","value":"5"},{"label":"Ylempi korkeakouluaste","value":"6"},{"label":"Tutkijakoulutusaste","value":"7"},{"label":"Koulutusaste tuntematon","value":"NEW-0"}]},{"type":"LIST","listType":"RADIO","name":"4","caption":"Maakunta","options":[{"label":"Uusimaa","value":"0"},{"label":"Varsinais-Suomi","value":"1"},{"label":"Satakunta","value":"2"},{"label":"Kanta-Häme","value":"3"},{"label":"Pirkanmaa","value":"4"},{"label":"Päijät-Häme","value":"5"},{"label":"Kymenlaakso","value":"6"},{"label":"Etelä-Karjala","value":"7"},{"label":"Etelä-Savo","value":"8"},{"label":"Pohjois-Savo","value":"9"},{"label":"Pohjois-Karjala","value":"10"},{"label":"Keski-Suomi","value":"11"},{"label":"Etelä-Pohjanmaa","value":"12"},{"label":"Pohjanmaa","value":"13"},{"label":"Keski-Pohjanmaa","value":"14"},{"label":"Pohjois-Pohjanmaa","value":"15"},{"label":"Kainuu","value":"16"},{"label":"Lappi","value":"17"},{"label":"Ahvenanmaa - Åland","value":"18"}]}]', 'fi', max(id) from LocalizedEntry
insert into QueryPageTemplateLocalizedSetting (id, value_id) select (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplateSetting) as id, (select max(id) from LocalizedEntry) as value_id

insert into QueryPageTemplateSetting (id, key_id, queryPageTemplate_id) select max(id) + 1, (select id from QueryPageSettingKey where name = "visible"), (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplate) from QueryPageTemplateSetting
insert QueryPageTemplateSimpleSetting (id, value) select (select max(id) from QueryPageTemplateSetting), '1'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from QueryPageTemplate) where sequence_name = 'QueryPageTemplate'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedEntry) where sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from LocalizedValue) where sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from QueryPageSettingKey) where sequence_name = 'QueryPageSettingKey'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from QueryPageSetting) where sequence_name = 'QueryPageSetting'
update hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (select max(id) + 1 from QueryPageTemplateSetting) where sequence_name = 'QueryPageTemplateSetting'
